summary: While Hirono is in prison, his rival Takeda turns his own crime organization into a political party, whose two executives stir up new tensions in their thirst for power.
cast: Seizô Fukumoto|Nobuo Kaneko|Jô Shishido|Bunta Sugawara|Yasuhiro Suzuki|Kunie Tanaka|Nobuo Yana|Hiroko Fuji|Gorô Ibuki|Ryûji Katagiri|Takuzô Kawatani|Kin'ya Kitaôji|Akira Kobayashi|Hiroki Matsukata|Ryô Nishida|Yumiko Nogawa|Takashi Noguchi|Junkichi Orimoto|Kenichi Sakuragi|Harumi Sone|Asao Uchida|Shingo Yamashiro
title: Jingi naki tatakai: Kanketsu-hen
